acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should be able to fill in POJOs with raw type collection attributes and default values to Object
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldBeAbleToFillInPojosWithRawTypeCollectionAttributesAndDefaultValueToObject

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ReadOnlyRawFieldsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.Object
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type class java.lang.Object and value of type class java.lang.Object
